body: It disappeared from the dark places but things like me did not escape. We're still down there. Painting with our... with our... fingers and... our toes... we paint pictures of horses and sheep of birds and trees of trucks and houses, someone painted a picture of a... a thing that looked like a... a ball of meat and hair, bloody and wet... we didn't complain... just watched... and waited... m a s t u r b a t i n g with the paint... slip slop slap, slip slop slap, slip slop... slap. You wake up in a cold sweat, "it was just a dream, just that dream again" you go to wipe your forehead with your hand, your breath catches in your throat... there's paint on your hand.
